name: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the
France
description: There is no lovelier month to travel in France, as the first melons ripen in Provence and outdoor markets burst with new-found colour. Spring is always in.

name: Germany
description: One of the loveliest months, often surprisingly warm and sunny, perfect for ringing in beer garden season. Plenty of public holidays, which Germans turn into extended weekends or miniholidays, meaning busy roads and lodging shortages.

name: Greece
description: If you're planning to go hiking, May is a great time to hit Greece's trails. Temperatures are relatively mild and wildflowers create a huge splash of colour. Local produce fills Greek kitchens.

name: Italy
description: The month of roses and cultural festivals is a perfect time to travel. The weather is warm but not too hot, and prices are good value. Especially good for walkers.

name: Norway
description: By May, Norway has a real spring in its step: the weather's warming up, Norway's renowned music festivals get under way and tourists have yet to arrive in great numbers.

name: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
Spain
description: A glorious time to be in Spain, May sees the countryside carpeted with spring wildflowers and it feels like summer is just around the corner.
